text: Rustavi () is a city in Georgia. It was founded in the 4th century by Trdat of Iberia. In the 13th century, it became empty. Rustavi was rebuilt in the 20th century. Rustavi has the Rustavi Metallurgical Plant. As of 2014, the city had 125,103 people. == Other websites == * Official Site of City Category:Settlements in Georgia (country) Category:4th-century establishments
title: Rustavi
